title: Top Floor PENTHOUSE with Puget Sound WATER VIEWS
posting_body: Mercer Crest Residential is located on the south slope of Queen Anne on the Mercer Street corridor!
Conveniently located for a pedestrian lifestyle close to downtown, Seattle Center, and South Lake Union.
There is easy access to transportation; Metro, Rapid Ride, Zip Cars with quick access to Highway 99 and I-5.
Mercer Crest is a mid-century building from the 1950's with updated interiors, security main entrance, laundry facilities, individual storage units, and gated parking for additional fee.
This penthouse is a spacious 2 bedroom/1 bath on the top floor that features almost 1,200 square feet of living space, with a private balcony that looks out to the sound.
The bedrooms are large and have lots of closet space, with your own washer/dryer in the bathroom.
Just off the entry is a nook that could be used for an in-home office, plus an additional coat closet.
The living room is lined with windows, and the dining area is located by glass sliders to the balcony.
Utility Fee: Based on number of occupants: $65 (1) $115 (2)
